title: Remove profile functionality

requirements.text: Remove the profile page route and ProfilePage component from the frontend application
acceptanceCriteria: ProfilePage.tsx is removed from frontend/src/pages/
Profile route is removed from App.tsx router configuration
Application builds and runs without errors after profile removal

requirements.text: Remove all profile-related components including ProfileHeader, ProfileTabs, PersonalInfoSection, BettingHistorySection, TransactionHistorySection, SettingsSection, ProfileSetupModal, and PhoneVerificationModal
acceptanceCriteria: ProfileHeader.tsx is removed from frontend/src/components/
ProfileTabs.tsx is removed from frontend/src/components/
PersonalInfoSection.tsx is removed from frontend/src/components/
BettingHistorySection.tsx is removed from frontend/src/components/
TransactionHistorySection.tsx is removed from frontend/src/components/
SettingsSection.tsx is removed from frontend/src/components/
ProfileSetupModal.tsx is removed from frontend/src/components/
PhoneVerificationModal.tsx is removed from frontend/src/components/
No unused imports or references to removed components remain in the codebase

requirements.text: Remove backend functions related to user profile management including getUserProfile, createUserProfile, updateUserProfile, verifyPhone, resendVerificationCode, and getTotalMemberCount
acceptanceCriteria: getUserProfile function is removed from backend/main.mo
createUserProfile function is removed from backend/main.mo
updateUserProfile function is removed from backend/main.mo
verifyPhone function is removed from backend/main.mo
resendVerificationCode function is removed from backend/main.mo
getTotalMemberCount function is removed from backend/main.mo
UserProfile type definition and related stable variable storage are removed
Backend compiles successfully after profile function removal

requirements.text: Remove React Query hooks related to profile operations including useGetUserProfile, useCreateUserProfile, useUpdateUserProfile, useVerifyPhone, useResendVerificationCode, and useGetTotalMemberCount from useQueries.ts
acceptanceCriteria: useGetUserProfile hook is removed from frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts
useCreateUserProfile hook is removed from frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts
useUpdateUserProfile hook is removed from frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts
useVerifyPhone hook is removed from frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts
useResendVerificationCode hook is removed from frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts
useGetTotalMemberCount hook is removed from frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts
No components attempt to import or use the removed hooks

requirements.text: Remove phone validation utilities from frontend/src/utils/phoneValidation.ts as they are only used by profile components
acceptanceCriteria: phoneValidation.ts is removed from frontend/src/utils/
No remaining components reference phone validation functions

requirements.text: Remove MemberCountCard and BalanceCard components as they are only used in the profile interface
acceptanceCriteria: MemberCountCard.tsx is removed from frontend/src/components/
BalanceCard.tsx is removed from frontend/src/components/
No remaining components attempt to import these components

constraints: Keep the deposit functionality (DepositSection component) intact as it may be used elsewhere
Keep the admin functionality (AdminPage, AdminFundsReleaseSection) intact
Keep the authentication system (Internet Identity hooks) intact
Do not modify backend transaction and deposit logic unrelated to profile management
nonGoals: Removing admin interfaces or fund release capabilities
Removing authentication system or Internet Identity integration
Modifying the M-PESA paybill 400004 payment system
